Alert Name: My Custom Alert
Networks win battle over FCC decency rules
Court calls FCC's decency standards "arbitrary and capricious," asks agency to clarify its policy.
06/04/07 05:34 PM, EDT
A U.S. appeals court Monday overruled federal regulators who decided that expletives uttered on broadcast television violated decency standards, a major victory for TV networks.
